      • booleanQueryDB

        public static boolean booleanQueryDB(java.lang.String query)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method used to perform query on the database that returns a boolean values.
        Parameters:
        query - The query that will be performed.
        Returns:
        false if the result's length is 0 true otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • insertUser

        public static int insertUser(java.lang.String n,
                             java.lang.String c,
                             java.lang.String u,
                             java.lang.String e,
                             java.lang.String p)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method used to insert a new user in the database. When there is a new subscription to the system this method will be used to handle it.
        Parameters:
        n - user's first name
        c - user's last name
        u - user's username
        e - user's email
        p - user's password
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

        public static java.util.LinkedList<Gioco> getGames()
                                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method used to retrieve all the information related to all the games in the system. These information are stored into a linked list.
        Returns:
        LinkedList list with all the games' information.

                                                                  throws java.sql.SQLException

      • aggiungiRecensione

        public static void aggiungiRecensione(java.lang.String recensioneText,
                                      int idGioco)
                               throws java.sql.SQLException

        recensioneText - review's text
        idGioco - game's id.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
